trans-unit.source: Implements the `SGen` task.
Use the `SGen` element in your project file to create and execute this task.
For usage and parameter information, see [SGen Task](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.SGen"></xref> class.
Gets or sets the assembly to generate serialization code for.
The assembly to generate serialization code for.
Gets or sets the path to the assembly to generate serialization code for.
The path to the assembly to generate serialization code for.

Gets or sets a Boolean value that specifies whether the `SGen` task places the public key in the assembly (<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>) or fully signs the assembly (<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>).

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the `SGen` task places the public key in the assembly; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the `SGen` task fully signs the assembly.
Gets the switches and other information that the command line tool must run directly from the command line and not from a response file.
A string containing the switches and other information that the command line tool must run directly from the command line and not from a response file.
Gets the full file path of the SGen tool.
The full file path of the SGen tool.
Gets or sets a container that holds a key pair.
The `SGen` task will sign the assembly by inserting a public key into the assembly manifest, and then will then sign the final assembly with the private key.
The container that holds a key pair.
Gets or sets a key pair or a public key to use to sign an assembly.
The compiler inserts the public key in the assembly manifest and then signs the final assembly with the private key.
A key pair or a public key to use to sign an assembly.
Gets or sets the compiler platform to use to generate the output assembly.
Returns the compiler platform to use.
Gets or sets the assemblies that are referenced by the types requiring XML serialization.
The assemblies that are referenced by the types requiring XML serialization.
Gets or sets the SDK Tools path.
Returns the SDK Tools path.
Gets or sets the generated serialization assembly.
The generated serialization assembly.
Gets the name of the generated serialization assembly.
The name of the generated serialization assembly.
Gets or sets a Boolean value that specifies whether the `SGen` task should generate a serialization assembly.
If this property is `true`, the [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/add/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] engine will execute the `SGen` task and generate a serialization assembly.
If this property is false, the [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/add/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] engine will not execute the `SGen` task.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the `SGen` task should generate a serialization assembly; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Indicates whether task execution should be skipped.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if task execution should be skipped; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets the name of the tool executable file (sgen.exe).
The name of the tool executable file.
Gets or sets a list of specific types to generate serialization code for.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_SGen" name="SGen" href=""></xref> generates code only for these types.
Returns a list of specific types.
Gets or sets a Boolean value that specifies whether the `SGen` task generates serialization code only for the XML Web service proxy types.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the `SGen` task generates serialization code only for the XML Web service proxy types; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Validates input parameters and logs errors or warnings, if any.
Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether task execution should proceed.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if task execution should proceed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
